Trade/Device Name(s): ADVOCATE Redi-Code Duo Blood Glucose plus Blood Pressure Monitoring System
ADVOCATE Redi-Code Duo Blood Glucose plus Blood Pressure Monitoring System, model TD-3223E
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): ADVOCATE Redi-Code Duo Blood Glucose plus Blood Pressure Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ADVOCATE Redi-Code Duo system for monitoring blood glucose and noninvasive wrist blood pressure, using biosensor and oscillometric technology.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from finger or alternative sites and noninvasive measurement of systolic/diastolic blood pressure and pulse rate; intended for use by healthcare professionals and people with diabetes mellitus at home; not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes, hypertension, or for use on neonates.
